replies.bodyText:
I generally

use IllegalStateException in default switch statements that come from enums; and
print the name or value of the enum value that caused it in the message

However, neither one very important given that we should never get here unless someone has added a new value to the enum without updating the places its used from.
replies.author: lmsurpre
